poemsDataJson.list_full: 筑波嶺(つくばね)の 峰(みね)より落(お)つる みなの川(がは) 恋(こひ)ぞ積(つ)もりて 淵(ふち)となりぬる
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: From Tsukuba's peak//Falling waters have become//Mina's still, full flow://So my love has grown to be//Like the river's quiet deeps.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Tsukuba-ne no|Mine yori otsuru|Mina no gawa|Koi zo tsumorite|Fuchi to nari nuru
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: こひそつもりて ふちとなりぬる
poemsDataJson.author: 陽成院(ようぜいいん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: ひそかな恋心が積もり深い物思いに悩んでいること
